content: a simple versatile beanie pattern ideal for a quick gift or a donation to your favorite charity utilizing double crochets and back loop single_crochet crochets this project works up with ease thank you to gary boston for the name suggestion please consider making a donation to your local food bank in lieu of payment for this pattern published in conjunction with knit for food experience level beginner materials worsted weight yarn 6 oz/170g/315 yd skein 4 mm crochet hook stitch marker s tapestry needle sizes one size adaptable finished measurements circumference 18 / 46 cm worn with 2 /5cm of negative ease
